title: Landing Page Loads Successfully with Marketing Content
description: Verify that the marketing landing page loads correctly with hero section, feature highlights, 3-tier pricing plans, and call-to-action buttons visible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the root URL of the application.
Check that hero section with product pitch is visible.
Verify features grid displays all key features described.
Ensure 3-tier pricing plans are shown with appropriate details.
Confirm that call-to-action buttons are present and clickable.

title: User Signup with Email and Password
description: Test user signup flow creating a new account with valid email and password, followed by successful login.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page.
Enter a valid, unique email address and a strong password.
Submit the signup form.
Confirm that the account is created successfully and user is redirected to dashboard or login.
If redirected to login, input email and password and submit.
Verify user is logged in and session is maintained (e.g., access to dashboard).

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure that login attempt with incorrect email or password fails and shows appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input invalid email or password combination.
Submit the login form.
Verify that login is rejected with an error notification.

title: API Key Generation and Copy in User Dashboard
description: Validate that an authenticated user can generate a new MCP API key, view existing keys, and copy the key to clipboard.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user and navigate to the User Dashboard.
Check that API keys section is visible.
Click the button to generate a new API key.
Confirm a new API key appears in the list.
Click the copy button next to an API key.
Ensure the API key is copied to clipboard successfully.

title: Monthly Token Usage Chart Renders with Data
description: Verify that the monthly token usage chart is displayed correctly on the dashboard with accurate backend data and updates accordingly.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user and navigate to the User Dashboard.
Confirm that the usage chart component is rendered.
Check the chart data matches backend usage metrics for the user.

title: Route Explorer Displays MCP Tools with Parameters and Examples
description: Check that the Route Explorer page displays all MCP tools (search_articles, get_article, get_facts_about, get_latest_news) with input parameters and sample responses.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Route Explorer page.
Verify that all four MCP tools are listed.
Check that each tool shows required input parameters.
Verify sample results are displayed for example inputs.

title: User Updates Email in Settings
description: Validate that a user can update their email address via the User Settings page and that the change persists after refresh or new login.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to User Settings page.
Input a new valid email address in the email update form.
Submit the email update.
Verify that the update confirmation is shown.
Log out and log in again using the new email if applicable.
Confirm that the new email is recognized and user accesses their account.

title: User Data Export Produces Correct JSON File
description: Ensure that a user can export their personal data from the User Settings page in GDPR-compliant JSON format and the data includes all relevant user information.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to User Settings page.
Click the button to export personal data.
Check that a JSON file download is triggered.
Verify file contents include user profile, API keys, usage, and other personal info.

title: User Account Deletion with GDPR Compliance
description: Test the ability for a user to request account deletion from the User Settings page, ensuring data is removed and confirmation is provided.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to User Settings page.
Initiate account deletion request.
Verify that a confirmation prompt is shown.
Confirm account deletion action.
Check that user is logged out and account data is no longer accessible.

title: Admin Panel Access Control and Metrics Display
description: Confirm that only admin-role users can access the Admin Panel, and that system metrics and user management features display data accurately.

steps.description: Log in as admin user and navigate to Admin Panel.
Verify that system metrics are visible and reflect backend data.
Check that user CRUD operations are listed.
Log out and log in as regular user.
Attempt to navigate to Admin Panel.
Ensure access is denied or user is redirected appropriately.

title: Admin User CRUD Operations
description: Validate that an admin can create, read, update, and delete user accounts via the Admin Panel user management interface.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to user management section.
Create a new user with valid details.
Verify the new user appears in the user list.
Edit an existing user’s details.
Confirm updated details are saved and displayed.
Delete a user from the system.
Confirm the user is removed from the list.

title: Admin Plan Override and Token Reset
description: Check that the admin can override user subscription plans and reset their tokens from the admin dashboard, and that changes reflect immediately.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to user management.
Select a user and change their subscription plan.
Verify the change is saved and visible on user details.
Perform token reset for the user.
Confirm tokens are reset and user is notified or tokens invalidated.

title: Role-Based Route Protection Middleware Blocks Unauthorized Access
description: Test that protected routes enforce authentication and only allow users with correct roles to access specified pages or API routes.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected user dashboard URL without login.
Verify user is redirected to login page or blocked.
Log in as user without admin role and attempt to access admin panel URL.
Verify access is denied or redirected away.
Log in as admin and access admin protected routes.
Confirm access is granted successfully.

title: Dark Mode Theme Toggles and Persists
description: Verify that dark mode can be toggled manually by the user, respects system preferences on initial load, and persists user choice across sessions.

steps.description: Load the app with system preference set to dark mode.
Confirm app renders in dark mode by default.
Toggle theme to light mode using theme switch control.
Verify UI updates to light mode.
Reload the app or navigate away and back.
Check that the manually selected theme persists.

title: Responsive UI Rendering on Various Screen Sizes
description: Check the application’s UI responsiveness by rendering on multiple screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop) and ensuring usability and layout correctness.

steps.description: Open the app in a desktop viewport.
Confirm all interface components are rendered correctly without overlap or cutoff.
Resize viewport to tablet screen size.
Ensure layout adjusts with appropriate navigation and content scaling.
Resize viewport to mobile screen size.
Verify usability of navigation, input fields, buttons, and visibility of content.

title: Full Local Setup with Database Migrations and Seeding
description: Validate the entire application and backend can be started locally with a single command, succeeding in running database migrations and seed data insertion without errors.

steps.description: Clone the repository and install dependencies.
Run the setup command to start the application locally.
Confirm that database migrations run successfully.
Verify autoseeding populates database with initial data.
Check that both frontend and backend start without runtime errors.

title: Error Handling on Invalid API Key Generation
description: Test that the system properly handles attempts to generate API keys under invalid or edge case conditions (e.g., exceeding key limits) and provides user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Log in as a user who has reached the API key generation limit.
Attempt to generate a new API key.
Verify that the system rejects the request with a clear error message.
Confirm no new API key is created.

title: User Settings Email Change Validation for Duplicate Email
description: Ensure that when a user attempts to change their email to an email already registered by another user, the system prevents the change and shows a validation error.

steps.description: Log in as user A.
Attempt to update email to another existing user B's email.
Submit the email change request.
Verify that validation error indicates email already in use.
Confirm user A's email remains unchanged.

title: API Route Authentication and Authorization Checks
description: Test REST API routes to ensure they properly enforce authentication and authorizations for user and admin operations using various invalid, valid, and edge case tokens and sessions.

steps.description: Make requests to protected user API routes without authentication token.
Verify API responds with unauthorized error.
Make authenticated requests with user token to admin-only API routes.
Confirm access is forbidden or denied.
Make authenticated admin requests to admin API routes.
Verify successful execution of API operations.
